channel.description: Co-founder WordPress; CEO Automattic; always learning.
channel.title: Matt on Tumblr

item.title: The new Terminal B at SFO is really nice. You almost feel like you’re in Singapore. SF is so back!
item.description:
The new Terminal B at SFO is really nice. You almost feel like you’re in Singapore. SF is so back!


Critical feedback:

* Stores should stay open later

* Faucets and sinks aren’t great

* Food and store selection is amazing, including Starbird. (Open late!)

* Feels like it could have more restrooms

item.title: You never know who you’ll meet. The sword was real! He decided to leave it at camp because it was…
item.description: You never know who you’ll meet. The sword was real! He decided to leave it at camp because it was too sharp.

item.title: #KOKON by Misha Libertee. BM Link. “#Kokon embodies purity and simplicity, mirroring the direct and…
item.description: #KOKON by Misha Libertee. BM Link. “#Kokon embodies purity and simplicity, mirroring the direct and focused way children with autism interact with their surroundings. The unicorn, a symbol of grace and uniqueness, celebrates the beauty of seeing the world differently, inviting a deeper appreciation for diverse perspectives.”

item.title: There was a symphony at the shipwreck, they played Claire de Lune, one of my favorites.
item.description:
There was a symphony at the shipwreck, they played Claire de Lune, one of my favorites.

Naga and The Captainess, by Cjay Roughgarden, Stephanie Shipman, and Jackie Scott. BM Link.

item.title: One of my playa gifts this year has been giving out copies of Kevin Kelly’s awesome book, which I…
item.description: One of my playa gifts this year has been giving out copies of Kevin Kelly’s awesome book, which I was able to meet him on-playa to sign. The other book I’m gifting is a pre-signed copy of Annaka Harris’ Conscious.
